content.content:
Web search results for query: "tech news today August 2025"

Links: [{"title":"Latest AI Breakthroughs and News: June, July, August 2025 | News","url":"https://www.crescendo.ai/news/latest-ai-news-and-updates"},{"title":"News Archive | August 2025 | TechRadar","url":"https://www.techradar.com/news/archive"},{"title":"Technology News","url":"https://www.cnbc.com/technology/"},{"title":"Android 16 August update rolling out with three Pixel fixes","url":"https://9to5google.com/2025/08/05/android-16-august-update-pixel/"},{"title":"SciTechDaily - Science, Space and Technology News 2025","url":"https://scitechdaily.com/"},{"title":"Top 10 Startup and Tech Funding News – August 5, 2025 - Tech Startups","url":"https://techstartups.com/2025/08/05/top-10-startup-and-tech-funding-news-august-5-2025/"},{"title":"25 New Technology Trends for 2025 | Emerging Technologies 2025","url":"https://www.simplilearn.com/top-technology-trends-and-jobs-article"},{"title":"8 new features in August 2025 Security Update for Windows 11 | Windows Central","url":"https://www.windowscentral.com/microsoft/windows-11/8-new-features-arriving-with-the-august-2025-security-update-for-windows-11"},{"title":"August 2025 – The Tech News Source","url":"https://thetechnewssource.com/2025/08/"},{"title":"Top 10 Startup and Tech Funding News – August 4, 2025 - Tech Startups","url":"https://techstartups.com/2025/08/04/top-10-startup-and-tech-funding-news-august-4-2025/"}]

Based on my search for tech news in August 2025, here are the key technology stories happening today:

## Major AI and Technology News

**AI Breakthroughs and Research**
Researchers have used AI to design novel battery materials with the potential to dramatically improve energy storage. The discovery could lead to longer-lasting, faster-charging, and more sustainable batteries.(no content)Scientists have developed a universal AI detector that can identify deepfake videos with 98% accuracy across platforms and content types.

**Government and Business AI Developments**
OpenAI is giving ChatGPT to the government for $1, while ChatGPT-maker OpenAI has raised a massive $8.3 billion in new funding at a staggering $300 billion valuation.

**Consumer Technology Updates**
There are three security issues resolved in the Android 16 August patch dated 2025-08-01 and three for 2025-08-05. Vulnerabilities range from high to critical. Meanwhile, Microsoft is expected to start rolling out the August 2025 Security Update for Windows 11, which includes several new features and visual changes, in addition to security fixes and improvements. In this monthly update, you will find at least eight new improvements for version 24H2, including a feature to completely reset Windows Recall.

**Autonomous Technology Expansion**
White Castle has rolled out an AI-powered robot delivery service in parts of Chicago, in partnership with Cartken. The self-driving bots use computer vision and navigation AI to deliver meals to customers within a mile radius.

**Major Startup Funding**
On the bigger end, Ambience Healthcare closed a $243 million Series C, Clay raised $100 million to advance AI‑driven sales automation, and Anaconda secured over $150 million to expand its open‑source AI platform.

**Hardware and Infrastructure**
Broadcom has begun shipping a next-gen AI chip that enables ultra-fast connectivity between data center GPUs. Designed for hyperscalers, the chip supports massive AI model training by optimizing latency and bandwidth.

The tech landscape in August 2025 is clearly dominated by AI advancements, major funding rounds, security updates, and continued expansion of autonomous technologies across various industries.
